CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Lose Everything - Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Cox and daughter Barbara Jean, formerly of 1506 1/2 N. Murtland Street, moved from a rented home on Tioga Street, not long ago, they said. 'We lost everything in fire. We just sat across the street and watched it go.  We moved in last November,' Mrs. Cox said. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Cox family after losing their Homewood home on North Murtland Street to fire, including Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Cox and their daughter Barbara Jean, posed in interior with floral and lace curtains, television set, and crescent shaped curio shelf, another version
